error.message: Call to deprecated method getAvailableContexts() of class Drupal\layout_builder\Controller\ChooseBlockController. Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\layout_builder\Context\LayoutBuilderContextTrait::getPopulatedContexts() instead.

Using an "if" condition on "for" tag in "modules/contrib/layoutcomponents/modules/lc_simple_accordion/templates/layoutcomponents-block-content--simple-accordion.html.twig" at line 18 is deprecated since Twig 2.10.0, use a "filter" filter or an "if" condition inside the "for" body instead (if your condition depends on a variable updated inside the loop). See https://drupal.org/node/3071078.

Using an "if" condition on "for" tag in "modules/contrib/layoutcomponents/modules/lc_simple_tabs/templates/layoutcomponents-block-content--simple-tabs.html.twig" at line 65 is deprecated since Twig 2.10.0, use a "filter" filter or an "if" condition inside the "for" body instead (if your condition depends on a variable updated inside the loop). See https://drupal.org/node/3071078.
